text: |Infill development||Development that takes place on vacant or undeveloped sites between other developments and/or built form.| |Infrastructure Delivery Plan|IDP|An assessment of the existing and future infrastructure needs and requirements to support new development and the borough's growing population.| |Infrastructure Impact Assessment||A short document setting out the expected impact of new development on the infrastructure capacity of the borough, and identifying measures for mitigating this impact.| |Integrated Impact Assessment|IIA|As part of developing Tower Hamlet's Local Plan all policies have been subject to an IIA. The IIA comprises: Sustainability Appraisal, Health Impact Assessment, Equalities Impact Assessment and Habitat Regulation Assessment.|
